AbstractDatasetPart.description: Represents an abstract part of named alspac data set, in a version or freeze. For example in an omics context the data collected for a single chr which would be made availble as a dcat distribution of this type of dataset which would be of a specific file.

description.description: A human-readable description for a thing

id.description: A unique identifier for a thing

name.description: A human-readable name for a thing

AbstractDatasetPart.title: AbstractDatasetPart

AlspacDataCatalogue.description: Represents an alspac data catalogue. That is a set of named alspac data sets.

description.description: A human-readable description for a thing

id.description: A unique identifier for a thing

name.description: A human-readable name for a thing

primary_email.description: The main email address to contact

primary_investigator_orcid.description: the orcid id of the pi

AlspacDataSetVersion.description: Represents a version of a named_alspac_data_set. That is a specific set of data which internal people to alspac can use.

NamedAlspacDataSet.description: Represents a named_alspac_data_set. That is a set of data that has been collected or produced to be named, reused and distributed.
